reviews.review: Best of Marvel movies till now!

This was the best superhero movies I've ever seen! I thought it was a whole lot better than Black Panther!This action, acting, and visuals were amazingly fun! Although the ending was really sad in my opinion but the movie is still the G.O.A.T. of all superhero movies just behind the dark knight.

It's a huge daring step for Marvel Studios. And the flaws respresents how hard it is to combine everything together, no matter how different they are made. It feels exactly like another Marvel movie with a different twist this time around.

Overrated and underwhelming.   Most humor and story line is lost in too complex of a plot with too many characters who have no clue how they add to the story line.  Sad to see a decline in such a good movie premise.  If your expecting anything remotely as good as the first Avenger, you will be disappointed.  

However, if you are hard core comic book geek, you might find this to be a good movie with all the useless details included in a grab bag of complex innuendo dependent on prior movies.   Movie is a long waste of time... with a HORRIBLY CONFUSING ending.   

Thor should have hit ME in the head... it would have felt better than wasting hours of my life watching The Avengers being degraded by a studio's over inflated ego.
Terrible not happy with it and especially the ending
